replies.body:
Hi Zegita!

Happy birthday!
You are quite active on the Forums, and game.
Man, your PvP skills are just unique to you and only you. xD
Stay strong and stay cool!
Anyways, let's get to the questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. How tall are you?
3. Would you consider yourself a potato couch or an athlete?
4. What are your opinions on me?
5. What are your opinions South Korea and Greece?
6. What is your favorite food? (not fast food xD)
7. What is your favorite fruit?
8. Who is your favorite moderator?
9. What are your favorite experiences of Avicus?
10. What time did you wake up today?

Ok...that should be it!
I hope you enjoy your birthday!
Stay cool, stay awesome, and stay yourself!
See you in game!
replies.body_tagged:

Happy birthday!
You are quite active on the Forums, and game.
Man, your PvP skills are just unique to you and only you. xD

6. What is your favorite food? (not fast food xD)
7. What is your favorite fruit?
8. Who is your favorite moderator?

10. What time did you wake up today?

Ok...that should be it!
I hope you enjoy your birthday!
Stay cool, stay awesome, and stay yourself!
See you in game!

replies.body:
i don't know you too much I just remember fighting you a lot on the 1 hour fissura game and you targeted me quite a lot but I still won the fights ayy

Focus on aiming and strafing - forget those people that say "jitterclick get like 10cps for the best" nah I get like  7-8 cps I can combo fine probably why people are surprised at the way I play and I get accused a lot for it. It's also because if I try to jitterclick or click super fast my aim gets messed up and it just hurts my fingers and I don't want to end up with spazzed fingers and bones. Play some games like osu or aim games where it requires you to aim really well and you'll end up good. If you learn to perfect w-tapping it's good as well trust me so effective and make sure you use "ctrl" as your left sprint. I wouldn't have been good at pvp if it wasn't for BmB or kiwi telling me to fix my controls before I used to use "R" as my sprint button i don't know why lol - I just remember bajan canadian saying it was good for pvp but obviously you know he's a true noob and using "R" just allowed me to strafe one way whereas if you use "ctrl" you can strafe both ways so it's definitely better.
replies.body_tagged:
i don't know you too much I just remember fighting you a lot on the 1 hour fissura game and you targeted me quite a lot but I still won the fights ayy

Focus on aiming and strafing - forget those people that say "jitterclick get like 10cps for the best" nah I get like  7-8 cps I can combo fine probably why people are surprised at the way I play and I get accused a lot for it. It's also because if I try to jitterclick or click super fast my aim gets messed up and it just hurts my fingers and I don't want to end up with spazzed fingers and bones. Play some games like osu or aim games where it requires you to aim really well and you'll end up good. If you learn to perfect w-tapping it's good as well trust me so effective and make sure you use "ctrl" as your left sprint. I wouldn't have been good at pvp if it wasn't for BmB or kiwi telling me to fix my controls before I used to use "R" as my sprint button i don't know why lol - I just remember bajan canadian saying it was good for pvp but obviously you know he's a true noob and using "R" just allowed me to strafe one way whereas if you use "ctrl" you can strafe both ways so it's definitely better.

Hi Zegita!

Happy birthday!
You are quite active on the Forums, and game.
Man, your PvP skills are just unique to you and only you. xD
Stay strong and stay cool!
Anyways, let's get to the questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. How tall are you?
3. Would you consider yourself a potato couch or an athlete?
4. What are your opinions on me?
5. What are your opinions South Korea and Greece?
6. What is your favorite food? (not fast food xD)
7. What is your favorite fruit?
8. Who is your favorite moderator?
9. What are your favorite experiences of Avicus?
10. What time did you wake up today?

Ok...that should be it!
I hope you enjoy your birthday!
Stay cool, stay awesome, and stay yourself!
See you in game!

well i'm a skype group chat with my irl friends but idk where he is nowadays like pretty sure he rarely talks and stuff - i think he plays like csgo now or some game called rust but he still goes on minecraft from time to time. He jumps on Avicus as well but that's like every month and he just goes on to see what's going on.

you were a really chill guy when we first met and I had a shit ton of fun with you in Apollo back before tourney 1 and during - we always used to speak in ts and idk if you've gone inactive now i don't really see you on much in ts or it might just be me but yeah you were honestly a nice guy. Your pvp is good as well and it's nice to see you've stuck by with Apollo for a long time now (a year and a half now?) shows you're dedicated to your team :)
